name: Mazar Kush
description: Mazar Kush is an indica-dominant hybrid cross between Afghani and Mazar I Sharif, two age-old indica strains originating from the Afghanistan-Pakistan region. This strain delivers powerfully relaxing effects to both body and mind, making it a good choice for late night use or for after-work unwinding.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Giggly, Hungry, Pain, Insomnia, Inflammation, Stress, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Headache
